actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title VI of the Public Health Service Act to provide for the adequate outpatient care in medically underserved areas.

summary.text: Mobile Health Unit Act - Provides for grants under the Public Health Service Act to public and private non- profit organizations to assist them in purchasing mobile health units to serve residents of medically underserved areas. States that no grant shall be equal to more than 75 percent of the cost of such units. Authorizes appropriations for fiscal years 1976 through 1978, respectively, of $10,000,000; $15,000,000; and $20,000,000 to carry out this Act. Sets forth the application requirements for such grants, including: (1) a detailed description of the services to be provided; and (2) assurances that the personnel needed to staff such mobile health units shall be available.

titles.title: A bill to amend title VI of the Public Health Service Act to provide for the adequate outpatient care in medically underserved areas.
